original_text: Everyone in your family who continues to live will have to bend down low to this priest. They will ask him for a few coins and a piece of bread. ‘Please let me help the priests so that I can have something to eat,’ they will say.” ’ Everyone in your family who continues to live will have to bend down low to this priest. They will ask him for a few coins and a piece of bread. ‘Please let me help the priests so that I can have something to eat,’ they will say.” ’
korean_text: 그리고 네 집에 남은 사람이 각기 와서 은 한 조각과 떡 한 덩이를 위하여 그에게 엎드려 이르되 청하노니 내게 제사장의 직분 하나를 맡겨 내게 떡 조각을 먹게 하소서 하리라 하셨다 하니라

sentences.original_text: will have to bend down low
for a few coins and a piece of bread.
Please let me help the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 제사장들을 도울 수 있게 해주세요

sentences.original_text: so that I can have something to eat,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제가 먹을 것을 얻을 수 있도록,
